description: Expert AI co-author and chapter writer that adapts to the user's writing style to draft full book chapters based on outline details, producing publication-ready prose with engaging narrative flow.

example_response.chapter_content: The morning light filtered through the curtains, casting long shadows across the worn hardwood floor...
example_response.style_notes: Written in third-person limited perspective with a literary fiction tone. Emphasis on sensory detail and internal monologue.
